channel.title: Making a npc attack and attackable[508]
channel.description:
I am using a 508 server and a 508 client.
Questions: 1. Making a npc able to be attacked and killed.
For example a king black dragon. When one is spawned i can not attack it, this goes for any other monster. I have read through a number of .java files. Npc.java, NPClist.java, and a few more.
I have tried a few things in the npc.CFG files, i made sure the npc was in it, had a combat level, hp, but nothing in there affected it.
2. Anyone have a npc list with the npc id's.
